title: Canon EOS Rebel T7 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm Lens | Built-in Wi-Fi | 24.1 MP CMOS Sensor | DIGIC 4+ Image Processor and Full HD Videos
description: Perfect for beginners, this camera bundle offers the essential tools needed to take your SLR skills to new heights, all in one convenient package. No matter where your next adventure takes you, count on the EOS Rebel t7's impressive 24.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor and wide ISO range of 100-6400 (H: 12800) to capture high-quality images, even in low-light situations.
